isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine - Model Years Late 1997 to 2003 - Engine Electrical - Main Engine Wiring Harness - Inspection

step1.para: If any sensors are removed, clean off any thread locking compound from the sensor threads.
Check the connector pins on the sensors. If any pins are bent or corroded, replace the sensor.
Carefully inspect the wiring harness for worn conduit, frayed insulation, and heat damage. Repair as necessary.

item.para: corrosion (green or gray) or white deposits on metal terminals.
female connector sleeves that are spread open.
terminals that are incorrectly latched into the connector body or pushed back relative to other terminals in the same connector.

step1.para: Check the wiring harness connectors, connector covers, foam inserts, and cover shields for cracks, cuts, or worn areas. Replace as necessary.
